<small>Aramaic form: [[H4415]]</small>
 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָלַח‎</span>] **verb** ==tear away==, figurative ==dissipate== (compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***pull out*** eye, tooth, &amp;c.; especially [[BDB#Dozy|Dozy]] ***tear off branch*** to plant it, &amp;c. so Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***evellere***); — 

**Niph\`al** ==figurative== ***be dispersed in fragments, dissipated, Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁמַיִם כֶּעָשָׁן נִמְלָ֑חוּ‎</span> [[Isa.51.6|Isa 51:6]]. 



 III. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָלַח‎</span>] **verb denominative** ==salt, season==; **Qal** ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּמְלָ֑ךְ‎</span> followed by accusative [[Lev.2.13|Lev 2:13]] (object offering). **Pu\`al** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְמֻלָּח‎</span> [[Exod.30.35|Exod 30:35]] ***salted***, i.e. the incense (see [[BDB#Di|Di]].) **Hoph\`al** ***Perfect*** 2 feminine singular + ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָמְלֵחַ לֹא הֻמְלַ֫חַתּ‎</span> [[Ezek.16.4|Ezek 16:4]], i.e. ***rubbed*** or ***washed with salt*** (of infant, in personification).
